skills.name: Ack! Look at This Mess!
desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Hook deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of her ATK to a random enemy. In addition, there is a 100% **base chance** to inflict Burn on every enemy for 3 turn(s).
When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 50% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

eidolons.name: Early to Bed, Early to Rise
Happy Tummy, Happy Body
eidolons.desc: Extends the duration of Burn caused by Skill by 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Don't Be Picky, Nothing's Icky
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: It's Okay to Not Know
eidolons.desc: When Talent is triggered, there is a 100% base chance to Burn enemies adjacent to the target enemy, equivalent to that of Skill.

skillTree.name: Innocence
skillTree.desc: Hook restores HP equal to 5% of her Max HP whenever her Talent is triggered.

skillTree.name: Naivete
skillTree.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

skillTree.name: Playing With Fire
skillTree.desc: When using her Ultimate, Hook has her action Advanced Forward by 20% and Hook additionally regenerates 5 Energy.
